name: RMI Corporation
description: RMI Corporation is a global leader in the development and manufacturing of innovative materials and advanced manufacturing solutions. Established in 1995, RMI specializes in high-performance composites and lightweight materials that cater to a variety of industries including aerospace, automotive, and renewable energy. The company's mission is to drive sustainability and efficiency through the use of cutting-edge technologies and materials science. RMI's product portfolio includes carbon fiber composites, thermoplastics, and advanced metal alloys, known for their strength, durability, and lightweight properties. These products are pivotal in the creation of fuel-efficient vehicles and high-performance aerospace components. In addition to manufacturing, RMI invests heavily in research and development to push the boundaries of material science, with a focus on reducing environmental impact and enhancing product performance. The company is also committed to fostering partnerships with leading research institutions and industry players to innovate and develop new applications for its materials. RMI operates a state-of-the-art production facility equipped with the latest technology to ensure high-quality output and efficiency. With a strong emphasis on sustainability and innovation, RMI Corporation is well-positioned to meet the growing demands of the global market while contributing to a greener future.

seo.meta_title: RMI Corporation | Innovative Materials and Manufacturing Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore RMI Corporation, a leader in advanced materials and manufacturing solutions aimed at sustainability and high performance across industries.

faq.answer: RMI's main products include carbon fiber composites, thermoplastics, and advanced metal alloys.
